title: Dark Cinematic Drones & Horror Ambience Sound FX
description: 233 dark ambient sound effects perfect for creating horror ambiences, creepy soundscapes, industrial textures and otherworldly dark atmospheres!
longDescription:
Youtube Demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qxA9YExuZfo


Dystopian Drones sound library features 233 dark drone sound effects (227 min total) that instantly evoke unsettling feeling and post-apocalyptic images of a machine-dominated world, destroyed dystopian cities, deserted landscapes and sci-fi machine rooms, reactors and engines!


Perfect for creating disturbing eerie ambient backgrounds, evil horror ambiences and otherworldly alien soundscapes, these sound effects will enhance the tension and anticipation of any horror or sci-fi scene. You can choose between different types of drones ranging from intense pulsating ones, dynamic and evolving ones to the constant drones. Whether youâ€™re working on a post-apocalyptic video game, movie, tv show or if you need dark ambient textures for a music production, this sound library has you covered. All files are in Stereo WAV format. Sound effects are separated into three categories: 1. Evolving Drones 2. Pulsating Drones 3. Constant Drones


If you like the sound of Dystopian Drones then be sure to check out Annihilation, Into Abyss, and Ominous Drones sound libraries as well!


Sound Effects List: http://www.soundresponse.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/Dystopian-Drones-Sound-Effects-List.pdf
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 233

Number of Audio Cues: 233

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: Some sound effects are set to loop

Minutes of audio provided: 227 min
